Html:
I noticed that when publishing new stories, the "Published Dates" of the already published resources get reset.
Once published, the published date should not be recalculated.
This is same as Billboard Top 20 songs where can rank can vary at different time.

Sorry,

Maybe I was not entirely clear.
When someone submits a new article, and an admin publishes it, the "Published Date" is applied to the record. The problem is that it also re-enter this same published date to the articles already previously published- which is wrong. See Digg.
